product_name: The North Face WindWall 2 Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's WindWall 2 fleece jacket from The North Face fends off arctic gusts and traps body heat to help keep you warm, especially when layered under a shell. WindWall(R) fleece blocks a significant amount of wind yet still allows enough airflow to keep you dry and comfortable. Soft brushed grid backing adds cozy warmth. Elastic-bound cuffs and hood seal warmth in, weather out. The North Face WindWall 2 jacket for women features zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The women's WindWall 2 fleece jacket from The North Face fends off arctic gusts and traps body heat to help keep you warm, especially when layered under a shell.
